name: multileveled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a building or structure) consisting of more than one floor, or at different heights: The multileveled palace is a particular highlight. It’s a multi-leveled city built into the side of a mountain.
(of a system, organization, etc.) divided into or involving different levels or parts : Many institutions have a multileveled selection process.
More examplesFewer examplesThere's a multi-leveled set leading up to the stage.We have a sort of multi-leveled legal system. The multileveled price scale was replaced by a two-rate system. The book is a multileveled account of the lives of two sisters.
